--as Powell drops out from the ship, as his chair SPROUTS like wings and he tips forward, ENGINES firing--  112. --as it becomes a LOK-WING GLIDER and transports him towa AIRSHIP CARRIER on the far side of the city.
Carter and Dejah watch him escape...as Carter reveals her DIAMOND STONE and hands it over. Dejah beams. She secures back in her navel’s gold mounting...
I knew you'd come... And as they drift toward a turning SKY CANNON, Dejah leap the remaining pilot’s seat--
Time to fly. --as she FIRES their wing-guns and obliterates it.
The Bomber LANDS back at the dock, where Tars, Sola, Wool forty surviving Tharks are waiting...
(from the controls) Everyone aboard the ship! Tharks lay down COVER FIRE, trading BLASTS with Guards on castle turrets. As Tars boards--
I give you Tars Tarkas, Princess... King of Thark.
We are eternally in your debt.
And we shall eternally remember it.

Where Powell's LOK-WING lands, WINGS retracting as he sna of his belt and the chair-glider hits the ground-- --as he marches past DOZENS OF AIRMEN scurrying into thei Assault Fliers. A stunned COLONEL races to him--
Lord Prince, those were Tharks--  113.
Helium. As fast as this thing can fly.
As CARRIER PLATFORMS detach from their spire perches and FLIERS launch, the heroes’ stolen Bomber BLASTS AWAY from city...just ahead of the attacking wave.
The war rages on as ANGLE FOLLOWS a FLEET of a thousand Z ASSAULT FLIERS on a kamikaze path for Helium...as the shi become HEAT-MIRAGES, rendered near-invisible...

Tardos Mors issues orders with his ADVISERS, as the entir palace SHUDDERS around them, starting to crumble from the barrage, as SCREAMING ENGINES rise-- --and he sees the “MIRAGE”-LIKE DISTURBANCES IN THE SKY--

..-which now OPEN FIRE! EXPLOSIONS ring out as the invisi enemy STRAFES the city! Their concentrated FIRE blows rip holes in the city’s DOME-LIKE FORCE SHIELD -- allowing th attack the inner city! The King and his Advisers race for cover as EMBER BOMBS l the palace gardens and hot EMBER-FRAG blows through the w and obliterates our view in SPARKING WHITE!

Powell's stolen airship SOARS toward Helium, with the ent Zodangan Fleet now in staggered pursuit... INT. POWELL’S BOMBER Tars sits at the helm, with Carter, Dejah and Sola ~~ as flier is BUFFETED by gunfire--
I must tell you. These Zodangans... they build lovely machines to fly.
--as Tars DIVEBOMBS the ship toward the ground, trying to Assault Fliers on their tail...while other Tharks man the cannons, RETURNING FIRE.  114.

ZODANGAN BATTALIONS march through the mouth of the valley separating their troop encampments from the borders of He THOUSANDS of TROOPS storm toward the city-- --where the AIR BATTLE has already commenced, with EXPLOS raining through the floating sections of the metropolis-~ --as HELIUM DEFENSE ENGINEERS race backup “SHIELD GENERAT into position. Like fixed searchlights that make up the “patchwork” sections of the FORCE SHIELD enclosing the ci Wherever a section is breached, the engineers aim a backu --as Helium SCOUT FLIERS and INTERCEPTORS take to the ski dogfight with their near-invisible foes--

From a city overlook, Tardos Mors rushes through the rubb gaze down at the oncoming ground BATTALIONS. Directly ben the suspended city, Helium’s own GROUND TROOPS await. But they're severely overmatched.
Too many, too strong...if the shields fall, we're finished...

They‘re on the palisades! The King gazes upward...to the ridges that rim the idylli valley, to see MORE SOLDIERS sweep into view... -..except these soldiers are Tharks. A THOUSAND THARKS come scrambling pell-mell over the vall palisades, with ZITIDARS perched high, as Tharks toss dow weapons from the tented cargo holds on their backs.
Send word to all commanders! Let the Tharks join the ranks! Let them join! (with amazement) They fight for us.
Led by Major Jakkal, the Tharks join the fray...

++-racing past the line of Helium defenses for the honor being the first into battle! They meet the Zodangan Battalions on the battlefield HEAD sweeping four-armed spear and blade-strikes into the line RADIUM RIFLE-firing soldiers!
Approaching Helium, Powell stands with two ADMIRALS, surv the AERIAL DOGFIGHT that’s begun--
The Tharks are with them, Lord Prince.
They are to few and no match for our technology. Fire at will. Destroy those shields.

No? Like I can’t defy gravity? Or travel through time and space? We can save this planet -- you and me. If Helium resists, we'll cut off their rain. Their hydrogen, nitrogen, oxygen. Until they realize I WAS HERE

Told you I‘d bring you home... He closes Powell's eyes and then notices a cord around hi He pulls it into view...to reveal the King’s DIAMOND STON affixed to it. Carter grips it tightly...as if wanting to hang onto a wo knows he’s now lost...and then snaps it free.

At the foot of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Where CANNONS li abandoned, and SOLDIERS in Civil War dress -- blues and g are crossing the field to opposite sides.
Home, he said. Home.

It was the Virginia I had once longed for. But it was not my time. (beat) Toy From that moment forth, it was ina memory. In a dream.. He looks up to a mountain ridge, where there’s a small CA high on a hill.

Of a life perhaps lost forever... He looks again at the DIAMOND STONE around his neck.

What I‘d lived through had changed me. I was no longer like other men. The years would pass, and they would die...but I did not. ANGLE PANS to the window and the Shenandoah Valley below, see a TIMELAPSE VERSION of over a century of progress. Pa roads, horses to cars, hamlets to cities...  131.
